title: Implement Critical Thinking Protocol as Universal Protocol in RMS-BMAD
description:
Epic: Implement Critical Thinking Protocol as Universal Protocol in RMS-BMAD

## Overview
Make critical thinking an always-on cognitive substrate rather than an invocable skill. 
Based on Paul-Elder framework and academic research on LLM calibration.

## Key Decisions
1. Four-layer cognitive substrate (Dispositions, Triggers, Standards, Metacognition)
2. Natural language hedging instead of numeric confidence
3. Graduated disagreement response (Mild  Severe)
4. External verification requirement
5. Domain-specific checkpoints

## Documentation
- Decision Document: docs/decisions/DEC-001-critical-thinking-protocol.md (DOC-PROC-001)
- Research: Research_Measuring_Critical_Thinking_AI_Coding_Agents.md
- Research: Critical_Thinking_Protocol_Synthesized.md

## Sub-Tasks
- Phase 1 (64): Foundation - Core dispositions and basic triggers
- Phase 2 (65): Enhancement - Automatic triggers and domain checkpoints
- Phase 3 (66): Full Integration - Complete cognitive substrate
- Phase 4 (67): Testing - Metrics and evaluation
- Doc (68): README update
- Doc (69): USER-GUIDE update
- Doc (70): Release notes update

## Status
Ready for Phase 1 implementation

title: Phase 1: Foundation - Add minimal critical thinking protocol to CLAUDE.md
Phase 2: Enhancement - Add automatic triggers and domain-specific checkpoints
Phase 3: Full Integration - Complete cognitive substrate model with self-improving feedback
Phase 4: Testing - Establish baseline, implement test patterns, define metrics
